Sentencas: Physical vapor deposition (PVD) can be used to produce high-quality Gd2O3-doped CeO2 (GDC) films.
Titulo: Fabrication of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 thin films through DC reactive sputtering and their application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Among various PVD methods, reactive sputtering provides unique benefits, such as high deposition rates and easy upscaling for industrial applications.
Titulo: Fabrication of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 thin films through DC reactive sputtering and their application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: GDC thin films were successfully fabricated through reactive sputtering using a Gd0.2Ce0.8 (at%) metallic target, and their application in solid oxide fuel cells, such as buffer layers between yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ)/La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta and as sublayers in the steel/coating system, was evaluated.
Titulo: Fabrication of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 thin films through DC reactive sputtering and their application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: First, the direct current (DC) reactive-sputtering behavior of the GdCe metallic target was determined.
Titulo: Fabrication of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 thin films through DC reactive sputtering and their application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Then, the GDC films were deposited on NiO-YSZ/YSZ half-cells to investigate the influence of oxygen flow rate on the quality of annealed GDC films.
Titulo: Fabrication of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 thin films through DC reactive sputtering and their application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results demonstrated that reactive sputtering can be used to prepare thin and dense GDC buffer layers without high-temperature sintering.
Titulo: Fabrication of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 thin films through DC reactive sputtering and their application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the cells with a sputtered GDC buffer layer showed better electrochemical performance than those with a screen-printed GDC buffer layer.
Titulo: Fabrication of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 thin films through DC reactive sputtering and their application in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the insertion of a GDC sublayer between the SUS441 interconnects and the Mn-Co spinel coatings contributed to the reduction of the oxidation rate for SUS441 at operating temperatures, according to the area-specific resistance tests.
Titulo: Fabrication of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 thin films through DC reactive sputtering and their application in solid oxide fuel cells
